title: Molecular Biology: Principles and Practice 1st Edition c2012 Cox
description:
Molecular Biology: Principles and Practice, 1st Edition (c2012), textbook by Michael M. Cox, Jennifer A. Doudna & Michael O'Donnell.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://www.macmillanhighered.com/Catalog/product/molecularbiology-firstedition-cox" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.macmillanhighered.com/Catalog/product/molecularbiology-firstedition-cox</a>
(ISBN-13: 9780716779988)
(2nd edition just out: <a href=" http://www.macmillanhighered.com/Catalog/product/molecularbiology-secondedition-cox)" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.macmillanhighered.com/Catalog/product/molecularbiology-secondedition-cox)</a>
(ISBN-13: 9781464126147)

CONTENTS:
--------
PART I - Foundations
 1. Studying the Molecules of Life
 2. DNA: The Repository of Biological Information
 3. The Chemical Basis of Information Molecules
 4. Protein Structure
 5. Protein Function
PART II - Nucleic Acid Structure and Methods
 6. DNA and RNA Structure
 7. Studying Genes
 8. Genomes, Transcriptomes, and Proteomes
 9. Topology: Functional Deformations of DNA
 10. Nucleosomes, Chromatin, and Chromosome Structure
PART III - Information Transfer
 11. DNA Replication
 12. DNA Mutation and Repair
 13. Recombinational DNA Repair and Homologous Recombination
 14. Site-Specific Recombination and Transposition
 15. DNA-Dependent Synthesis of RNA
 16. RNA Processing
 17. The Genetic Code
 18. Protein Synthesis
PART IV - Regulation
 19. Regulating the Flow of Information
 20. The Regulation of Gene Expression in Bacteria
 21. The Transcriptional Regulation of Gene Expression in Eukaryotes
 22. The Post-Transcriptional Regulation of Gene Expression in Eukaryotes
APPENDIX: Model Organisms
Glossary
Index

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF (211 MB; with some downsampling; good enough for evaluation)
Compressed (zipped): *right-click* the filename (.7z) & choose *Extract* to convert to PDF; discard the .7z file (container) when done with seeding
